The good-looking young woman with aid-she says her name is Ai and that she draws erotic comics for a living-seems to have no clue either as to their whereabouts. Their only leads are cryptic instructions beamed to a portable device. Has the game begun?

"Kyomu Senshi Miroku" and "Jaki-oh Bakuretsu," both of which started serialization in 1987, just a few months apart. Lastly, "Skull Killer Jaki-oh," a mech series set in the 20th century that originally started in 1990.

Over four decades ago, Yoshihiro Tastsumi expanded the horizons of comics storytelling by using the visual language of manga to tell gritty, literary short stories about the private lives of everyday people. He has been called "the grandfather of Japanese alternative comics" and has influenced generations of cartoonists, but, until now, the majority of his works has remained unavailable outside of Japan. By turns poetic, comical, and deeply unsettling, Abandon the Old in Tokyo is a collection of unforgettable short stories from the modern master.

Theirs wouldn't have been a marriage of love; the purpose of the marriage was to get Vidal to give his assistance to the bank her parents own. She absolutely loves cooking, cleaning, and pretty much anything else "domestic," so being a housekeeper is a natural career choice, short of getting married and starting a family for herself. Strange things have begun to occur around Akimi.  Someone has just moved into the empty apartment right underneath hers, but no one has actually seen this mysterious new neighbor.  In addition, random things keep disappearing from the building such as a desk, a bike, and even her own mother...??

Norou Ningyou:
Mariko is a daughter of a wealthy family celebrating her 16th birthday.  However, Mariko's crush Takayuki shows up with her friend Mio by his side and dampens her mood.  To cheer herself up, Mariko looks through her presents and finds a cursing doll with a card that tells her how to use it to get rid of her enemies...

Shinku no Kage:
When she was young, Kaoru and her family spent a summer at a vacation home in the mountains.  One afternoon, she and her younger brother Kazurou found a mysterious coffin in the basement.  As she turned to leave, she thought she heard a voice say "Please move me".  Little did she know that this was just the beginning of the huge tragedy that befell her family.

title: Arve Rezzle: Kikaijikake no Yousei-tachi

synopsis:
A cyber battle sci-fi. In 2022, the technology of quantum computing has greatly advanced and many people have transfered their mind into the cyber space.

Remu's sister, Shiki, skipped grades and entered a high school in the academic city "Okinotori-island Mega Float City (OMFC)" when she was 14. One day, Shiki confessed to her brother via Skype that she was talking to him directly from the cyber space and her real body had been kept in a water tank filled with a culture medium. It's called "Body pool" and Shiki connected to the network by nanomachines implanted in her brain.

Remu was surprised but he accepted her decision until an accident called "Early Rupture" happened. The network server got overloaded and users' minds were lost in cyber space leaving soulless living bodies in the Body Pools. In order to bring Shiki's mind back, Remu visits her apartment in OMFC and there meets Shiki escaped from the hospital. But the girl tells him that she is not Shiki and she happens to haven taken over Shiki's body.

When Remu tries to figure out the situation, a violent attack strikes the apartment.

We just want to have a fair trial – for ourselves and for those who still have hope for the world.

His teacher and also his cousin, Ms. Misato, forces Amahiko to join the archery team at school thinking that it might help overcome his fear of sports. Archery is a sport where, although you do compete against other players, the main opponent is yourself. If you are able to overcome the negativity inside you and win against yourself, you will be able to hit the target. Initially, Amahiko was unable to hit the target because of the demon inside him, but when he was able to face his mistakes and own up to it, he turned out to be an archer with a lot of potential. For all her life, high school teacher Park Jagi has been able to foresee imminent disasters, but she has never succeeded in preventing them from happening. One day, she forecasts a terrible tragedy at her own school. However, unlike her previous nightmares, this time she appears within the vision to stop the event—alongside three other people she has not met before. With a few days remaining before the catastrophe will take place, Jagi is spurred into action to change the future and begins seeking out her potential allies.

Soon, Jagi encounters the mysterious strangers who, like herself, possess time-related abilities: Kim Young-Tak, a student who can stop time; Chang Sae-Yoon, a narcoleptic woman who can witness incidents 10 minutes before they occur; and Kang Min-Hyuk, a troubled office worker who can rewind time by 10 seconds. Just when she attempts to enlist their help, sudden calamity strikes the school. Seeing as horrifying incidents have begun occurring earlier than expected, Jagi realizes that she may have misjudged the cause and consequences of her premonition.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Shikatsushi: Joou no Houigaku

synonyms: Living Corpse Master: Queen of Forensic Pathology
Mistress of Corpse Resuscitation: Queen of Forensic Medicine
alternative_titles.ja: 屍活師 女王の法医学

synopsis:
Hajime Inukai is a student at the H University medical school, and she dreams of becoming a clinical doctor. However, for some reason, she's been assigned to work in a forensic medical science lab, under a weird, but incredibly skilled, associate professor called Kiriyama Yuki. Hajime hadn't expected her 'patients' to be corpses undergoing an autopsy, and she most certainly didn't expect the first case she attended to with Kiriyama would be the apparent suicide of a girl she knew. During their investigation of the case, Hajime also began to see flashes of the dead girl, as if she had come back to life for mere moments. Will Hajime be able to handle her time in forensic medicine, and work her way back to having living patients?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

宇宙コンビニ業務日誌

終焉世界の天災姫〈レベリオン〉

title: Kanashii Hatsukoi
synopsis:
One summer, young Charlotte met Riccardo and fell in love. Then she discovered that he, the son of a noble family in Italy, was merely enjoying summer love, and her days of devoting her heart and body ended in tragedy. Some years later, Riccardo's mean looks still haunt and pain her. Now a real-estate agent, Charlotte is shocked when she finds her next client is none other than the unforgettable Riccardo!

(Source: Harlequin/SB Creative Corp.)

title: Kudan no Folklore

alternative_titles.ja: クダンノフォークロア

synopsis:
Gossips around town spoke of an urban legend called "Kudan". It is said that "Kudan" takes the form of a woman wearing western mourning dress. She lacks a right wrist, and her face is hidden behind a black veil. It is predicted that those who lay eyes on "Kudan", within 7 days calamity will befall them.

Through strange coincidence, 16 years old Sakuya Kudan meets cooking class instructor Touko Shima. As they come in contact with each other, faint feelings grow between the two. However, as Touko happened to come across the fearful "Kudan", her peaceful everyday life came to an end. As each day passed, "Kudan" kept creeping closer to her. Sakuya tries her best to protect her and attempts to find countermeasures.

At Kudan Girls High School, there's a club that focused on studying folklore. Together with the Mystery Research Club president, Koto Akinashi, Sakuya will take on the unknown folklore so as to protect her loved one.

(Source: VNDB, edited)

title: Furimuite, Yukino-chan!

alternative_titles.ja: ふり向いて、ゆきのちゃん!

synopsis:
University classes have commenced, and Arata Hasumi is just one of the confused freshmen cluelessly navigating the campus. Fortunately, an unnamed senior shows Arata around the place, making Arata optimistic toward his first day in college.

Furthermore, on his first day of school, Arata will finally get the chance to meet his online friend, Yukino. Yukino has always given Arata sweet words of encouragement during the summer; since then, Arata has fallen in love with her. Unbeknownst to Arata, the senior who helped him earlier is the very same Yukino whom he hopes to meet! When Arata discovers that his online friend is a guy, the optimistic freshman cannot help but be devastated. Despite this, Arata slowly realizes that he is deeply in love with him and his kind words. Arata sees Yukino as someone special, and someday, he hopes that Yukino will look at him the same way as well.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Tenshi no Tamago-ryouri
synopsis:
The student Take begins to go to the cooking school for his father who lost his wife, but Take has no talent for cooking and he didn't make any progress. Then the teacher of the cooking school, Kurahashi is asked to come to Take's home to cook dinner for his father. But his father was a lover of Kurahashi who disappeared for ten years ago....) and one short shota story of doctors and his child patient.

(Source: MU)

title: Nazo no Murasame-kun
synopsis:
Murasame Kunai is just your average high school boy…except for the fact that he’s a ninja and his father is a spy for the Secret Service. Will Kunai be able to keep this a secret in order to save the lives of his loved ones…and his own? 


(Source: MU)

alternative_titles.ja: はたらく魔王さま!　ハイスクールN!

title: Kakeau Tsukihi
synopsis:
Tsuki Arito and Yo Kamikoma move to Tokyo to become comedians. With a 9 m² apartment and just 300 yen for food expenses, the two best friends begin to chase their big dream.

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

title: Panda Love
synopsis: A story about a panda who tries to help humans in a city, but always ends messing up everything.

title: Furachi na Ai no Uta
synopsis:
"A" and "B" met at the paradise-like Northern islands; "A" turns "B" into putty in his hands, using honeyed words and an aggressive attitude, but "A" is actually a selfish player! He wants to have both his fiancee and "pig mouth" at the same time, but this causes "B" to fall into an abyss of pain. Caught in this sad three person relationship, will "A's" final decision shock everyone?!

It (Chapter 1-3)
A free-spirited and flamboyant high-school surfer, Yuuto, is best friends and best enemies with his 'second-in-command' Iusagi. Together with Aminato and Satori, they form a tight, happy-go-lucky clique. Well, until Yuuto discovers, to his bewilderment, that not only is Iusagi gay, but that Iusagi is into HIM! Of course, all it takes is a little encouragement from Iusagi, and timely interfering from the other two nosy sidekicks for Yuuto to see the 'light'.

(Source: MU)

title: Kimi wa Junai ni Fusawashii

alternative_titles.ja: 君は純愛にふさわしい

synopsis:
"He's annoying, overly familiar, and to be honest, he makes me feel uncomfortable, until I saw that side profile."

Tsuga, who is fed up with the alpha supremacy of the world, has lived his life with a sense of propriety despite his alpha status. One day, however, he sees his least favorite classmate, Matsumae, staring blankly at the river from a bridge. Matsumae who is usually boisterous, was seen with an uncharacteristic side profile by Tsuga, and from then on, Tsuga couldn't leave him alone?!

(Source: Libre, translated)

title: Kiss de Go!
synopsis:
Collection of oneshots.

1) Kiss de Go : a girl marries in order to be more free.

2) Tabetai Baby- Ayu has can only love her childhood friend Kuma. Realizing this while she's in bed with Motoharu is a bit strange though. But she's determined to give her first time to Kuma, and Motoharu who loves her, wants to help her?!

title: Oshiego to no Doukyo wa Senjou yori mo Ki ga Yasumaranai

alternative_titles.en: Living With Student Is Less Relaxing Than on the Battlefield
alternative_titles.ja: 教え子との同居は戦場よりも気が休まらない

synopsis:
Soujurou Toudou is a former mercenary instructor who survived the war with his student, Sylpha. After the war, Soujurou took the orphan Sylpha with him back home to Japan, where he suddenly realized that he had a crush on her. However, he wanted Sylpha to live life as a normal girl, so he decided to step aside and let her go. But to his surprise, Sylpha also confessed that she loved Soujurou, too... A love comedy about a former mercenary instructor and his student living together!

(Source: Flex Comix, translated)

title: Shine Post: Nee Shitteta? Watashi wo Zettai Idol ni Suru Tame no, Goku Futsuu de Atarimae na, Tobikkiri no Mahou

synonyms: Shine Post: Did You Know? The Most Ordinary, Natural, and Unique Magic to Make Me an Absolute Idol
alternative_titles.ja: シャインポスト ねえ知ってた? 私を絶対アイドルにするための、ごく普通で当たり前な、とびっきりの魔法

synopsis:
The idol unit "TINGS" has big dreams, but only small achievements, and is not very popular. The best manager in the world was supposed to be their savior, but... "I'm not interested in being your manager." The man who shows up is Naose Hinaki, a man with no motivation. However, he has a special power...? This is a story of you and the girls shining brightly to become "absolute idols." The best idol entertainment begins here!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title: Team Phoenix

alternative_titles.ja: チーム・フェニックス

synopsis: It has been 100 years since the war by the Alliance of Natural Life and Robots. Now that 90% of the universe is dominated by the robot alliance, Sapphire, the knight of Silverland, has formed a space pirate to overcome this absurd world!

title: Kodomo wa Tomaranai
synopsis:
Continuing on the story of the Obinata household, the focus this time is on the two youngest members, Yuuta and Mayumi.

This is the second in a series of stories:
1. Mainichi Seiten
2. Kodomo wa Tomaranai
3. Children's Time
4. Kodomo no Iibun
5. Isoganaide.
6. Hanaya no Nikai de

Although not specifically "sequels", this is the order that the stories were written/published in.

title: Eve no Onnatachi
synopsis:
In Eve no Onnatachi, by Matsufuji Junko, Aiko is unhappy in her marriage—her husband only married her to get ahead at work, and he's hardly ever home. Luckily, she has Kyouko, a woman she met online one lonely night. But when Aiko's husband suspects she's having an affair, their vision of a happy Christmas Eve together is looking less and less likely.

(Source: Lililicious)

title: King Marker
synopsis:
Rei, a young high schooler gets a strange mail on her new cell phone. An infinite symbol. When she opens it, a young boy magically appears and tells Rei that she must grade his performance as king. Now, this young boy, Rouel, is under the care of her and her younger brother, Ichita. So what adventures will begin from opening this mail?

(Source: MU)

title: Bukiyou na Hakui no Nugashikata

alternative_titles.en: How to Remove a Lab Coat
alternative_titles.ja: 不器用な白衣の脱がし方

synopsis:
Kaoru Kuze, a school nurse, was forced to transfer to a countryside high school due to being relentlessly stalked by a co-worker. His first day starts out rough when he walks into his new office, only to be greeted by Motoaki Wakura, a tall, blonde guy who looks like he belongs in a gang...! Kaoru soon learns that this scary-looking guy is in fact very caring and dependable. When Kaoru falls asleep in his office one day, he's shocked to find Motoaki beside him when he wakes up, with a flirtatious look on his face...

(Source: Renta!)

alternative_titles.ja: 完パイ!つよつよお姉ちゃん

alternative_titles.en: Happy Sex Life with Myla the Vampire of the Deep

synopsis:
"Sorry, but you ain't dyin' just yet!"

Would you say no to an eternity of mad sex with a dark-skinned, gyaru, vampire girl? We thought so. Enjoy this new full-colored work by Yanyo featuring the ridiculously cute Myla! 
(Source: Irodori Comics)

title: Meguru Kakuutei
synopsis:
A fantasy tale about a boy who enters a magical manuscript and discover "the inn of the imagination." But all's not fantasy and fun here, because there's a price to be paid for venturing into this world.

(Source: CMX)

Included one-shot: 999 Banme no Hana

title: Kaitou Thief Milky Drop

alternative_titles.ja: 怪盗ミルキィ☆ドロップ

synopsis: N/A

title: Mienai Kao
synopsis:
One day, Onozuka Miki receives a call from her older sister, Tatebayashi Midori, from whom she was separated years ago.  Midori desperately begs for her help, afraid that a killer is after her life!  Miki quickly transfers schools to Midori's posh private boarding school, but not two days pass before she is swept into a whirlwind of unexplainable murders...

Note: Included in vol. 2 is a one-shot by Matsumoto Yoko-sensei titled "Nemesis no Yoru" about a group of students who spend 5 days on a deserted island with a killer who murders them off one by one...

title: Nambul
synopsis:
As the second Middle Eastern war drives the world economy toward another crisis, Japan decides to invade Indonesia in search of a new source of oil. Forces are being deployed, and secret alliances are being made. Meanwhile, urban violence explodes onto the streets of Tokyo, and Hae-sung, the leader of a Korean-Japanese teenage mob, gets caught on camera by an NHK reporter as he murders a Yakuza boss.

Political tensions reach boiling point as the exposure of Korean concentration camps in Indonesia leads Korea to enter the war. Alliances between neighboring countries are forged as the world readies itself for a massive clash. In the midst of the chaos, Hae-sung must hide from the police and the Yakuza, both of whom want to find and execute him.

The ramifications of Korea's war against Japan are felt closer to home as Korean citizens living in Japan are branded as "outsiders." The tragedy of Auschwitz repeats itself as these people are forced to wear identifying armbands, are ostracized by the Japanese populace and forced into Korean ghettos. The segregation takes a turn for the worse as Koreans are herded onto trains and sent to war camps. All the while, Korean and Japanese armed forces wage all-out war against each other on land, sea and air.

The lucky ones, like Yusung and Uhmji, lose their jobs but are allowed to return home to the Oh family residence. With the fugitive Hae-Sung now in police custody, the Yakuza look to his family for revenge.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Zantei, Koibito
synopsis:
From Storm in Heaven:

They'd been drunk. More specifically, his boss had been drunk. So when Sakamoto jumped him, Kurahashi just went along with it. After all, it was just the alcohol, right? Wrong. At least, that's what his boss thinks, and said boss doesn't have a problem with trying out a relationship with a colleague he thinks is in love with him. Unable to gainsay him, Kurahashi gets dragged into a relationship he never asked for - and he finds himself getting deeper than he ever imagined.

title: This Life to the Next
synopsis:
Isaeng and Jeongto were inseparable childhood friends until Jeongto's father died tragically at the hands of a bitter soul. These two friends reunite ten years later as adversaries: Isaeng guides souls to the afterlife, while Jeongto gives souls another chance to live. After all this time, can these two work out their issues? And what do the Kings of Hell have to do with all of this?

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Death/Communication

alternative_titles.ja: デス/コミュニケーション

synopsis:
Ninomae (Iko) is a tom-boyish girl who recently transferred to the Saint Stella School. Her new roommates, Shitanaga (Niko) and Shinomae (Miko) are just the kind of girl Iko wants to surround herself with to become more girlish. Iko soon learns from her classmates about a rumored object called the Chalice that grants wishes. It was originally stored in an abandoned church on campus but recently, it has been stolen, much to Iko’s dismay. The three roommates go to the church to investigate the missing object where they meet 2 mysterious figures Siren and Reverse Cross who have the Chalice. However, they escape before the girls have a chance to question them.

Who are these mysterious figures that stole the wish granting Chalice? Who is Iko’s best friend Azuma, who is hospitalized? What is the connection between Iko’s search for the Chalice and her relationship with Azuma? Find out more by reading Death Communication.

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Stainless Steel Armadillo
synopsis:
Two sisters on their way to learn new magical skills travel through a world whose technology stems from dragons. They will meet both friends and foes on their dangerous quest - and learn a little about themselves on the way!

See 'More Info' for Jp/US publishing data.

alternative_titles.ja: 園田健一初期作品集―Fuse box

title: Nijiko the Party
synopsis: Nijiko loves party and she likes to design and make party dresses. She attends a Fashion design school but decided to quit the school and get married with Shoutarou after meeting with him for a few times. Her reason to married Shoutarou is that, she doesn't dislike him. After their marriage, even though she quit the design school and is a housewife now, Nijiko is still likes the to party and enjoy making dresses. In each episode, while the couple learns more about each other, Nijiko will relates events from her marriage life with different kind of parties and uses it as an inspiration for her to make her own party dress.

title: Shounen Shikku
synopsis:
Ootori Haruki was the ace of his school's soccer team and spent a lot of time and effort doing things specifically to look cool. He'd been filling the role he chose for himself pretty well, until the transfer student Jinmyou Kaoru came along. Not only did Kaoru have the natural "cool" look and act down, he also seemed to be effortlessly better than Haruki at soccer. Will Haruki be able to rise to the challenge of his new rival?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

Included one-shot:
Volume 1: 57th

alternative_titles.ja: 神話大戦ギルガメッシュナイト

title: The House: Kaika no Ouji-sama
synopsis:
Akari Honda, 26, works for a web production company and writes on the side, enjoying a remote life in a house full of her favorite things. Then, a "prince" suddenly appears. He lives in the room below and complains about noise and strange smells! But then he makes Akari's life at home sparkle with happiness, even though she's supposedly a nuisance to him...!

(Source: MU)

title: Help Man!

synonyms: Help Man!: One Touch of Nature Makes the Whole World Kin

synopsis:
Japan's population is becoming older. With the advances in medicine and technology, the average age of an individual has steadily risen, but the birth rate has dropped significantly since the "baby boomer" generation. This leads to a natural imbalance between the elderly versus the younger, working class population. What becomes necessary are people like Onda Momotarou to nurse the elderly gentlemen and ladies that are becoming increasingly senile.

His introduction into the "industry" of taking care of the elderly was shocking. What he saw was an elderly man being tied down to a bed for his own safety, while the nurses and caretakers consider this a "necessary evil." Momotarou is determined to help the elderly and bring back their smiles.

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Boku wa Oneesan to Q Shitai

synonyms: I want to answer all her questions
alternative_titles.ja: 僕はお姉さんとQしたい

title: Oneesan ja Dame Kashira?

alternative_titles.ja: お姉さんじゃダメかしら?

synopsis:
Compilation of short stories:
1. Ame to Yakusoku (Rain and a Promise)
2. Remodeling Brother
3. Otouto Junkie
4. Kenkyuushitsu de Aimashou (Let's Meet In The Laboratory)
5. Hizamazuite Kuchizuke o (Kneel Down And Kiss)
6. Mama Box
7. Ichigo Miruku (Strawberry Milk)
8. Noroi Delivery (Cursed Delivery)
9. Shimapon!!

title: Neko wa Himitsu no Basho ni iru

synonyms: うるわしの英国シリーズ, Uruwashi no Eikoku Series
alternative_titles.ja: 猫は秘密の場所にいる

synopsis:
Young, handsome, witty and the heir to a count household - Cornelius Everdeanne has all the essential features of a ‘great man’, yet he remains single somehow. Sit back as the graceful life in the high society of England, including the English way of courting, as well as mysterious incidents, unfold in this story.

This is a compilation of Akiko Hatsu's Uruwashi no Eikoku Series (うるわしの英国シリーズ), with some extra side stories.

title: Real Bian
synopsis: A fictionalized autobiography of gravure idol Ayaka Ichinose, the first lesbian to come out publicly in Japan's entertainment business.

title: Acquainted: Encounter Spin-Off
synopsis:
What appeared to be a one-time encounter in Spain blossoms into romance when by-the-book CEO Wooseok Jung and free-thinking architect Yujin Han meet again in Korea. The two are drawn to each other, but there's a catch: Yujin's the winner of a high-profile architecture competition held by Wooseok's company. When word gets out that these two are acquainted, will their love be able to survive the public's scrutiny... and their families' even harsher criticism?

(Source: Tapas Media)
